QuestData.Title: Leyline Feed: Kel'balor
QuestData.Description: <This feed appears to draw power from the leyline in order to become fully operational.$b$bYou should be able to imbue it with mana, but it will take a few minutes to draw enough leyline energy to accept the infusion.$b$bBeware, for creatures may notice the surge of arcane energy...>
QuestData.AreaDescription: Defend the Leyline Feed and infuse it with Ancient Mana.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend the Leyline Feed and infuse it with Ancient Mana.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you imbue the feed with the mana the structure stirs to life. Your skin tingles as the surrounding air becomes charged with arcane power.>
